title: Metaverse-Based Informal Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental science theories and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Implements informal learning environments using metaverse tools in smartphone-centric limited-tech settings

learning_goals: Perform at least one collaborative project for scientific problem-solving in a metaverse environment
Analyze the potential of three or more non-formal learning tools based on the metaverse
Submit five or more interaction records with peer learners using a mobile-optimized metaverse platform
Design one metaverse learning scenario reflecting practical experience in the science field

resources: LMS system (assignment submission and feedback management)
Web-based editor for 3D modeling tool alternatives
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
